title: paramapaavana
sahitya:
parama pAvana guNashAli nannu pAlimpavE vanamAli

caraNam 1

 anni nIvai uNDa lEdA nIvAkhilANDamula brOva lEdA
   
caraNam 2

 anni nIkinka daya rAdA ninn-anusarincina vADu gAdA
   
caraNam 3

 nIvADanai Aru dUra rAma nIvu nannEcEdi mEra
   
caraNam 4

 bhAvanamunu nIvEra mahAnubhAva mAkitaru laiyEra
   
caraNam 5

 dEvuDaina mA bhAnu kula tilaka nIvADanu nEnu
   
caraNam 6

 deivamulanu vEDalEnu nIku dAginaTTu lOku vainAnu
   
caraNam 7

 vittamu lEla veyi vElu rAma sattamAtramu nIvE cAlu
   
caraNam 8

 bhaktula kOsamu nIvu rAma shaktuDavai velasinAvu
   
caraNam 9

 rAjasapu jUpu sEyakurA tyAgarAja pUjita maravakurA
